title: In-game Lag
body: I am getting in game lag at the moment and my ms is fine ranging from 30-40 while i am lagging to the point that it is unplayable. I'm uncertain that it is my internet because everything else is fine videos didnt buffer at all and my internet itself is up to speed... any suggestions? ive repeatedly tried and i even had my brother load league on his pc and it worked so its not my net... Also if this helps it says server is busy when i log in

replies.body:
From what it sounds like, there could be a problem with between your network and ours.  This doesn't necessarily mean your internet itself, but somewhere information isn't getting through properly, especially if you're getting a "server busy" error message.

Go ahead and check out our [Connection Troubleshooting guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664) and go through the steps there.  It should help give us a better idea of what's going on as well as some initial troubleshooting steps to work on fixing the issue. Lemme know if it helps!

Nah this isn't true man this just happened to me also, I was in an all 4 one game, Says I connected lagged out so bad in loading screen... my gf sits right next to me is in game and it says I am connected, every 2-3 minutes it dc's me and she still is playing... Nothing to do with router, nothing to do with network this is def on your side.

I have enjoyed playing League for many years now with a consistent ping of 70. Since patch 6.9 myself and many other users are experiencing frequent lag spikes in game of up to 200-500. Even my use on this website is affected by lag issues but I am not having difficulty on any other web or game service. The game isn't playable right now for me. I have confidence that Riot will fix it, but many people are posting about it in threads right now and I haven't seen any notice put out that they are aware its a serious issue affecting this many people. I would really like to.
